title: Who should I contact with this complaint?
body:
I am extremely unhappy with the new Ashe being gated behind timed missions gated behind an RP paywall. I spend enough on this game (over $1k per year) that I believe my feedback may be useful to individuals/departments responsible selling content locked behind missions (which are a horrendously miserable experience in themselves). 

Please advise.

replies.body: The normal [**Championship Ashe skin is purchasable in the store**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/worlds-hits-the-rift-2017/#loot) as a normal skin. It's only the special chroma and ward that need to be crafted using tokens. I can understand where some might think this is some sort of paywall, and you're more than welcome to voice those concerns over in [**General Discussion**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion).
Are the mission tokens from the pass required to unlock both the chroma and the border, or is the pass not necessary to acquire both (or either)?
I'm not entirely sure since all of that info hasn't come out yet =\

######Pssst... Broporo.  Riot Katana answered with a bunch of extra info about this on Reddit.
https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/70wt7r/this_is_the_first_season_that_the_worlds_icon_is/dn6gfzn/

Btw, I miss seeing you guys on the Redtracker but understand the filter.
Hopefully I can catch another one of you guys' custom games soon <3
